comments.body: LOOTaDOG’s Genesis DOG 🐶 NFT Launch :Summaries on all features & JOIN US IN 1 DAY! 😎✅Genesis-Exclusive Benefits 😍✅Exciting extra Rewards 🎁✅Charitable Actions ❣️Read all about it here:Part 1: https://lootadog.medium.com/lootadogs-nft-is-finally-coming-the-genesis-dog-nft-launch-part-1-e815dcea1d8bPart 2:https://lootadog.medium.com/lootadogs-nft-is-finally-coming-the-genesis-dog-nft-launch-part-2-8705b904ca8a‼️ Mint Dates ‼️ 1 DAY COUNTDOWN!Genesis DOG NFT Minting Schedule 🐶For DP Holders: 📆 7.1.23For DP & AL Holders: 📆 7.2.23For DP & AL Holders and the Public: 📆 7.3.23Good luck on getting your first DOG NFT! 💪

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: 😍Exciting News!  🎊Partners with @theSNKRZ, the Move-And-Earn fitness💰reward Metaverse platform!🪙With SNKRZ ,  LOOTaDOG will establish a foundation for global expansion, including Korea, through diverse marketing collaborations.Join us as we revolutionize fitness with your 🦮dogs!  ⚠️ CAUTION ⚠️ 🚨 We have been noticed that there are fake collection on Opensea for LOOTaDOG GENESIS DOG NFT➡️ please click the official collection through our official webpage as http://lootadog.com/dognft✅ Opensea official collection link as  https://opensea.io/collection/lootadog-genesis-dog

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Message from the LAD Team 🐶 📣First of all, we would like to thank all who participated in the Genesis NFT mint event. 💙 💚It is true that not all who wished to participate were able to due to some inconveniences caused. We have listened to your feedback and we have exciting plans underway which we will announce soon! 🎉Thank you as always for your support! 🙏 🙏

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: ❗️LOOTaDOG First DAO Poll❗️We have listened to your feedback. Thus, we are planning for the new Genesis DOG NFT round to make the NFT available for more people! 🎉🎉To have a fair decision, we would like to ask for DOGPASS holders’ participation. 🗳️ Kindly cast your votes below! 👇https://snapshot.org/#/lootadog.eth

comments.body: 📢 GENESIS SILVER ROUND MINT DATES 📢❗This is the FINAL Genesis round ❗Please take note of the following dates: 📆🔹DP: July 8 (1200 qty. SECURED) ⏰ 10AM UTC🔹AL: July 9 (688 qty. SECURED) ⏰ 10:05 UTC🔹Public: July 10 ⏰10AM UTCPrice: 0.04 eth🔸 Max per wallet: 5 for both DP and ALMark your calendars and set your alarms! 🔥More info will be announced soon so stay tuned! 👀

comments.body: 📢 Genesis Dog NFT Benefits: Additional Walk Time 📢 Both Gold and Silver Genesis NFT owners can enjoy additional walk time! 🕰️You can enjoy up to 30 minutes of walk time depending on how many dogs you own! 😎 Check out this table below for a visual presentation 👇 📢 AL holders can start minting NOW! 📢Mint site: http://lootadog.com/dognft📆DP: still ongoing~📆AL Start: NOW! comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: 📢Genesis Silver PUBLIC Round is NOW OPEN!📢❗️This is your last chance to get Genesis Dog NFT ❗️Public round will end after 24H! 🥈🔹Mint Site: http://lootadog.com/dognft💰Mint Price: 0.04 ETH✨DOGPASS and AL can still mint✨🔸Max of 5 per wallet ⏳Silver mint event will CLOSE when this round finishes! 🔒Don’t miss out! 🔥💪🎁 Giveaway!🎁SHOW OFF YOUR ACCESSORIES 🤩 and get a chance to win! 🥳🏆 Prize: 20 LADT x 5 PeopleTo enter:⭐ Follow @LOOTaDOG⭐ Like ♥️ and RT with a screenshot of your Dog NFT with accessory⏳Ending in 24HMint event still ongoing! Come and get your dog NFT now and start picking up accessories during walks! 🐕We’re excited to see what you got! 🐶

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: 🔒Genesis SILVER Round officially CLOSED! 🔒THANK YOU for participating in this mint event! 💞🥰We added this Silver Round to provide another opportunity for our early supporters to mint the Genesis Dog NFT and enjoy its benefits. 🤝We will finalize all details regarding both rounds so please look forward to all info to be released SOON! 🙏Thank you again for all your support! ♥️♥️♥️We appreciate your continued support for LOOTaDOG in silver round！❤️🎉We are please to announce 1000 silver nft has been minted ✅951 Silver Genesis ➡️members ✅49 Silver Genesis ➡️LAD teamStay tuned for the upcoming details regards to two rounds! 🫵* More NFT details are in DC

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: MetaAkita is one of the first web3 projects we collaborated with for AMA. They are currently seeking for donation on the recent flooding disaster in Akita prefecture. Let’s help spread the word. Every RT helps! 🙏"【Launch of Akita-Inu Reconstruction Fund, "AIRF"】Akita Prefecture, the home of Akita-Inu, has been hit by unprecedented flood disaster, affecting the lives of thousands of households.After the internal discussion, we decided to launch "Akita-Inu Reconstruction Fund" (AIRF) of NFTs.NFT enabled us to quickly implement a highly transparent, worldwide donation system.We have listed special version of donation NFTs on Opensea with a minimum donation of 0.01 ETH (about 2,600 yen).The donated crypto will be converted to Japanese Yen and donated to Akita Prefecture by Meta Akita.Donations to the AIRF can be made here.https://opensea.io/ja/collection/akita-inu-reconstruction-fundPress Releasehttps://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000010.000109304.htmlWe appreciate your cooperations."

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: 📢 NEW ACCESSORY SERIES IS OUT 📢You can now pick up new accessories during your walk! 🐙🐟♥️🎉🎉🎁 Giveaway 🎁✅ ♥️ & RT 🔁🏆 20 LADT x 3✨Accessories are constantly being updated ✨Don’t forget to share when you pick up these new accessories! 🤩Fandom is  thrilled to announce a new partnership with @LOOTaDOGLOOTaDOG a Web3 lifestyle app that has GameFi elements. The project’s aim is to build a one-stop-shop app to improve pets’ lives. It takes the simple step of pet owners walking their dog, and turns that daily activity to a walk-to-own activity.Partnership Event Link : https://bit.ly/476rquQFor more info : http://discord.gg/fandomstudio / http://discord.gg/LOOTaDOG
